titleStmt.title: The blessed birth-day celebrated in some pious meditations, on the angels anthem. Luke 2. 14. Also holy raptures in contemplating of the most obserueable adjuncts about our Saviours nativitie. By Charles Fitz-Geffry.
titleStmt.author: Fitz-Geffry, Charles, 1575?-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield printer to the University, and are to be sold by Ed. Forrest,
